title: Parita Shah
author: Parita Shah
description: Parita Shah practices Reiki, Chakra Balancing and Akashic Record healing to help clients connect to their truest essence. Parita became interested in Reiki and Meditation when she realized that the stress of her health issues were causing more health issues. She was determined to break the cycle...
cleaned_text: Crystal & Candle Grid Ritual to Seal Your Intentions If you're one of the many seekers that enjoys creating intentions, practicing mindful rituals and contemplating, you'll enjoy this candle and crystal ritual to start your New Year off with uplifted spirits. Creating intentions helps us to find clarity before taking action, so that our thoughts, behaviors, and endeavors can be more aligned with our purpose.
